name: Pleepr: A Social Media Game
description:
TRAILER ABOVE!

Pleepr is a fake social media platform where you are an influencer who fell out of fame after saying one too many bad things...

Your goal for 2023 is to rise back up to fame! There are 6 possible outcomes, so try and get the best ones possible!

Theme: After the End (After the End of your career, you must make a comeback!)

Controls: CLICK CLICK CLICK
